Add TileMatrix to Arrows/ArchRProject

addImputeWeights.Rd

This function for each sample will independently compute counts for each tile per cell in the Arrow File

addImputeWeights(ArchRProj = NULL, reducedDims = "IterativeLSI",
  dimsToUse = NULL, td = 3, ka = 4, sampleCells = max(5000,
  floor(nCells(ArchRProj)/10)), k = 15, epsilon = 1, weighted = TRUE)

Arguments

input

ArchRProject or ArrowFiles
chromSizes

chromomosome sizes used for identifying number of tiles to count
windowSize

size for each window to break up each chromosome
binarize

save as a Sparse.Binary.Matrix or Sparse.Integer.Matrix
excludeChr

exclude chromosomes from this analysis
threads

number of threads
parallelParam

parallel parameters for batch style execution
force

force overwriting previous TileMatrix in ArrowFile

Contents

  • Arguments
